document_data.name: Stirge
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Stirge''''' was a pirate ship that operated out of [[Jahaka Anchorage]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Crew: The ''Stirge'' was captained by the ostentatious pirate, [[Laskilar]]. The role of first mate was served by the [[half-orc]] [[Heel]]. IT had a crew of eighteen [[chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] and [[Tethyrian]] pirates, along with a [[priest]] of [[Umberlee]] named [[Caldos Hellinskorn]].
